text: tavada (‘mohu satya dutayeki’ yayi saksi darannata) ‘ek malayikavarayeku yæviya yutu noveda?’yi ovun pævasuha. (ovun kæmati vana andamatama) api ek malayikavarayeku yava tibune nam, (ovunge) karanava avasan vi tikhennata ida tibuni! pasuva (ehi) ovunta kisima kala avakasayakda nolækhennata ida tibuni. (evelema ovun vinasa vi yannata ida tibuni)
